# Core Rule 1 - Don't be a dick.
Everyone is playing this server to have a good time, dont play to intentionally ruin that.
## Examples
### [bold] Permitted [/bold]
- Causing issues for people who have wronged you this round. - Persuing other goals after finishing your jobs goals. - Acting antagonistic as an antagonist.
### [bold] Not Permitted [/bold]
- Needlessly sabotaging the station as non-antagonist roles. - Abandoning your job roundstart, EG: not setting up power as engi. - Causing problems for a character because you don't like their player. - Spamming any radio channel.
